sentences.english: Annotating the conception of green area ecological space of waterfront.
sentences.chinese: 詮釋了濱水區綠地生態空間的概念。

sentences.english: The knot is a dumpy, short-legged, wading bird.
sentences.chinese: 濱鷸是一種矮胖的短腳涉禽。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antitumor effect of gemcitabine in chemotherapy with breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討吉西他濱在乳腺癌化療中的作用。

sentences.english: Gemzar treatment is now considered the standard of care for pancreatic cancer following surgery.
sentences.chinese: 吉西他濱目前是作爲胰腺癌術後的標準治療藥物。

sentences.english: Gemcitabine is a new active drug in the treatment of advanced non small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).
sentences.chinese: 吉西他濱是近年來治療晚期非小細胞肺癌的有效新藥。

sentences.english: Capecitabine is already approved for use in colorectal cancer and metastatic breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 卡培他濱已被批准用於結腸直腸癌和乳腺轉移癌。

sentences.english: Over the years, however, this busy, successful waterfront area changed.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，然而，這種忙，成功的濱水區改變。

sentences.english: Yuanjiang city lies in the north of Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 沅江市位於湖南省北部，瀕臨洞庭湖濱。

sentences.english: An army of penguins paraded along the beach .
sentences.chinese: 一羣企鵝沿海濱列隊行進。

sentences.english: Toxic effects of capecitabine and fluorouracil were similar.
sentences.chinese: 卡培他濱和氟尿嘧啶的毒副作用相似。

sentences.english: Littoral and shallow lake can be divided into subfacies mudflat, mixed beaches, sandy beaches Microfacies dam.
sentences.chinese: 濱淺湖亞相可劃分爲泥灘，混合灘，砂質灘壩微相。

sentences.english: Aim To analyze and compare different syntheses of capecitabine.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析比較卡培他濱的幾種基本的合成路線。

sentences.english: Many buildings on the waterfront have been spruced up.
sentences.chinese: 濱水區有許多大樓都已修飾完畢。

sentences.english: Sunitinib and capecitabine doses were escalated in serial patient cohorts.
sentences.chinese: 在這些患者中舒尼替尼和卡培他濱的劑量逐步遞增。

sentences.english: Fishing boats and vehicles were carried ashore at Onahama port in Iwaki city.
sentences.chinese: 盤成郡的小名濱港口的漁船和車輛隨波漂流。

sentences.english: Nu Xiao pearl gold trade, the pondering Huangpu Bund waterfront.
sentences.chinese: 怒嘯明珠金貿下，沉吟黃浦外灘濱。

definition: East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
